sense.gloss: order picking (taking goods from a warehouse to fulfil customer orders)

sdata.j: ピクニックに↑出↑↓で↓かけていた↑間↑↓はざま↓、↑家↑↓いえ↓の↑錠↑↓じょう↓が↑泥棒↑↓どろぼう↓に|ピッキング|された。
sdata.e: While we were out for a picnic, our house's lock was picked by a thief.

sdata.j: 「|ピッキング|の↑道具↑↓どうぐ↓↑無↑↓な↓しで、どうやって↑侵入↑↓しんにゅう↓した？」「トイレの↑窓↑↓まど↓があいた」
sdata.e: How did you break in without any lockpicks? "The bathroom window was open."
